experience.name: LFX Mentee WasmEdge CNCF
content: Working on completing integration betweem WasmEdge Runtime and Apple MLX framework
Working on C++ API for MLX currently for loading models and inference in C++

experience.name: Open Source Contributions
content: Contribued an Example on Super Resoultion GAN in Pytorch-Ignite main repository
Added some features in Create supervised trainer class
Contributed to some routine CI issues
Created my AI App called AIKavach which verifies smoothing radius of various models
Made first issue in the MLX-apple frame-work! Yay!

experience.name: Inter IIT Tech Meet 12.0 - Adobe Challenge
content: Completed challenge by Adobe to predict the tweets text and likes using LLMs
Used models like LLAMA-7b and techniques like LORA and Adapter methods

experience.name: Quansight Labs Intern
content: Working on Pytorch Ignite-Code generator with Victor Fomin(maintainer)
Like to work on the PyData ecosystem

experience.name: Inter IIT Tech Meet 11.0 - ISRO Challenge
content: Participated in a challenge by ISRO to enhance the resolution of images captured by Chandrayaan 2 on the surface of the moon
Worked on ESRGANs and won Bronze medal for the Challenge

experience.name: Social Summer of Code - Hackathon
content: Participated in various small open sourced projects to have a feel about how open source works in the real world
Secured 14th place among more than 200 top developers
Learnt about DL projects, YOLOv5 and Django

experience.name: Data Science Group IITR
content: Got selected in the core team and loved the culture here
Learning about ML and DL concepts and building projects around it
Worked on Some projects like AI security and have been involved a lot in general events and lectures

experience.name: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee - Electrical Engineering Major
content: Secured an All India Rank of 1751 in JEE Advanced and got in EE program at IITR
Love working on electronics and basic stimulation projects
Love to see developments in Computer Vision related to robotics
